attributes.action: scrap the 2.35p fuel tax increase on the 1st October
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alistair Darling is now about to add an extra 2.35p tax to every litre of fuel sold in the UK on the 1st of October. This increase comes into force with oil prices are allready at record highs and every motorist is already being punished enough.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
